long_description: The women's Oakley Pulse Polarized Sunglasses add graceful, flattering style while offering a snug, comfortable fit and sun-blocking performance. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses offer great durability. Polished black frames feature black iridium polarized lenses for reduced glare and true color perception in extremely bright light. Lightweight, flexible nylon frames resist damaging stresses. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view. Nose pads and earpads are made from hydrophilic rubber that becomes tackier when you perspire, holding eyewear in place as you move. The Oakley Pulse Polarized Sunglasses feature metal icon accents at the hinges.
short_description: The women's Oakley Pulse Polarized Sunglasses add graceful, flattering style while offering a snug, comfortable fit and sun-blocking performance.
